org.jasonnet.bytes

Class ByteArrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasonnet.bytes.ByteArrays

  • public class ByteArrays
extends Object
    A set of helper functions for working with byte arrays.
    Author:
    jasonnet (12/18/2014)

    • Method Detail

      • indexOf

        public static int indexOf(byte[] haystack,
          int idxStartHaystack,
          int idxEndHaystack,
          byte[] needle)
        Find the location of the specified needle sequence in the specified range of the specified haystack sequence. This implementation differs from many other implementations in that it allows the caller to specify a range of the haystack array to consider. This can be handy if the whole array isn't populated or if one is incrementally parsing the array. To-do: (2014-12-18) This implementation could be made faster handling situations where the sequences are long and matches often don't occur early in the haystack subsequence.
        Parameters:
        haystack - the array in which to find the needle sequence.
        idxStartHaystack - the earliest index at which this routine should look for a match.
        idxEndHaystack - the end (exclusive) of haystack sequence in question. This value should not be larger that the length of the haystack array. This function will not possible consider matches that begin after index (idxEndHaystack - needle.length).
        needle - the sequence to be found.
        Returns:
        int -1 if a matching occurrance is not found. Otherwise, the index in to the haystack of the beginning of the match.

      • endsWith

        public static boolean endsWith(byte[] haystack,
               byte[] needle)
        Indicates if the specified haystack byte array ends with the specified needle byte array.
        Parameters:
        haystack - the array in which to find the needle sequence.
        needle - the sequence to be found.
        Returns:
        boolean

        public static boolean equalsAt(byte[] haystack,
               int posInHayStack,
               byte[] needle)
        Indicates if the specified haystack byte array at the specified position is equal to the specified needle byte array.
        Parameters:
        haystack - the array in which to find the needle sequence.
        posInHayStack - to check for a match
        needle - the sequence to be found.
        Returns:
        boolean
